radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple lesions initially thought to be areas of focal fatty sparing.
Enlarged liver with diffuse fat infiltration and multiple numerous focal lesions suggestive of multiple adenomas (adenomatosis).
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Subsequent MRI scans show no significant interval changes in the number or size of the adenomas.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Markedly echogenic and heterogeneous liver. The largest measured adenoma was 13 mm superficially in the left lobe (previously up to 11 mm), with others generally around 6 mm in diameter.

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: All MRI scans show no significant interval changes in the number or size of the adenomas.
